# f5distributedcloud_dns_lb_pool (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_dns_lb_pool` data source retrieves information about an existing DNS load balancer pool.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_dns_lb_pool" "example" {
  name      = "my-dns-lb-pool"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "pool_type" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_dns_lb_pool.example.pool_type
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the DNS LB pool to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the DNS LB pool is located.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the DNS LB pool.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the DNS LB pool.
- `pool_type` (String) Type of the DNS LB pool.
